title: Fix winner payout cap: raise max from 70% to 90%

requirements.summary: Update Admin Lottery Management page to allow winner payout percentage up to 90% instead of 70%
acceptanceCriteria: The 'Winner Payout %' input accepts values up to 90 without showing a validation error.
Entering 91 or higher shows an inline validation error.
The helper text reads 'System retains (100 - this value)% as profit. Max 90%'.
The calculated summary correctly shows the system profit as (100 - winnerPayoutPercent)% for any valid value.
Submitting the form with winnerPayoutPercent = 85 no longer results in a 'Failed to create lottery' error.

file_operations.description: Update the Winner Payout % field validation to allow values from 1 to 90 (changing from the current 1 to 70 limit). Modify the inline validation logic to show an error only when winnerPayoutPercent > 90 (not > 70). Update the helper text from 'System retains (100 - this value)% as profit. Max 70%' to 'System retains (100 - this value)% as profit. Max 90%'. Ensure the calculated System Profit summary displays the correct retained percentage (100 - winnerPayoutPercent) for any valid input value between 1 and 90.
